::Havotron::
"As long as you remember who is boss, Soundwave.  I, being made like 
MEgatron, but supereiour in every way, know that you were complete 
under his command and you so shall be under mine."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> --- Soundwave / Astrotrain / Switchblade ---
> 
> The "walkman" folds out, enlarging into a ten foot tall robot. In a 
> monotone voice, it bot talks, "I will not be terminated 
> indefinately." Soundwave stands beside Havotron, "I will act as 
your 
> communicator, Havotron."
> 
> Astrotrain hears Megatron's comm and responds to him and 
> Cyclonus, "Yes mighty Megatron. Cyclonus, I will meet you outside 
of 
> the base. Astrotrain exits the Dark Avian, and waits for Cyclonus.
> 
> Switchblade smirks at Motormaster, "Ha, put the big long pointy 
thing 
> back where it belongs," the deactivated demo charge on 
Motormaster's 
> back drops to the ground and comes to a rest between Motormaster's 
> legs. "Just say that the we were prisoners, that'll work just 
fine." 
> Switchblade hops off his chair, pushes the cyclone gun's barrel 
away, 
> and jumps back onto the console and begins to strugle at pulling 
out 
> the large sword. "We need ta fix the console before Megs finds 
out..."
